text:
admetrics | Frontend Developer | Frankfurt, Germany | Full time, ONSITE, VISA

Design & develop web applications for ML based ad efficiency optimization - You will be part of a cross functional team that consists of talented developers, data scientists and machine learning specialists in Frankfurt am Main Germany, Italy and Switzerland to solve some very challenging technical problems. You will help shape a product that is able to optimize ad efficiency based on enormous amounts of data.

Frontend Developer: https://admetrics.io/en/career_job/:web_developer
